fields.description: This is a parity issue since we have similar getters/setters for other translation properties on other proxies. Note that we also do not have a get/setOkid() or get/setMessageid().

comments.body:
Verified the fix.

The {{getTitleid(), setTitleid(), getMessageid(), setMessageid(), getOkid(), setOkid()}} works as expected.
Closing.

Environment:
Appc Studio : 4.7.0.201607250649
Ti SDK :  6.0.0.v20160817065403
Ti CLI : 5.0.9
Alloy : 1.9.1
MAC El Capitan : 10.11.6
Appc NPM : 4.2.7
Appc CLI : 6.0.0-24
Node: 4.4.4
Nexus 6 - Android 6.0.1
